original_title: UFC Fight Night 109: Gustafsson vs. Teixeira
overview: UFC Fight Night 109: Gustafsson vs. Teixeira was a mixed martial arts event produced by the Ultimate Fighting Championship held on May 28, 2017, at Ericsson Globe in Stockholm, Sweden. A light heavyweight bout between former UFC Light Heavyweight Championship challengers Alexander Gustafsson and Glover Teixeira served as the main event.
title: UFC Fight Night 109: Gustafsson vs. Teixeira
